attributes.action: stop sky and other networks taking english sports
attributes.additional_details: its unfair that american networks and other networks buy up all the sports in England so that we have to pay sky high fees to see our own sports that even started in England such as the premier league, cricket, formula one and others. bring it all back to free networks such as the BBC, ITV and others. sky in England is so high and in the USA its a dam sight lot cheaper
